item.description:

item.title: Resume
item.author: tebates@proton.me (Thomas Bates)
item.description:
Professional Experience

U.S. Department of Housing & Urban Development

Special Needs Assistance Specialist
Office of Community Planning & Development
September 2022 — Present

Joined HUD as a Presidential Management Fellow (PMF) in the Office of Community Planning & Development (CPD), working as a Special Needs Assistance Specialist (SNAPS). The SNAPS team administers the Continuum of Care (CoC) and Emergency Solutions Grants (ESG) programs.

Key focus areas include:

  • Data Policy
  • Federal Funding Competitions
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Sexual Orientation & Gender Identity (SOGI) Data
  • Technical Assistance
  • NSPIRE Implementation
  • CoC & ESG Regulation (24 CFR 578 & 24 CFR 576)

National Institutes of Health

Management Analyst
PMF Rotation, Office of Strategic Planning and Management Operations
July 2023 — November 2023
